article:
This is a list of computer programs that are predominantly used for '[[molecular
mechanics]]' calculations.

'Min' - Optimization, 'MD' - Molecular Dynamics, 'MC' - Monte Carlo, 'REM' -
Replica exchange method, 'QM' - Quantum mechanics, 'Imp' - Implicit water, 'GPU'
- GPU accelerated.

'Y' - Yes.  'I' - Has interface.

|-

Launch your simulation into a remote host with a single click, Deneb will
monitor them for you and retrieve the outputs.

| fast cluster. Closed source/Not free/Demo available
| [http://gpiutmd.iut.ac.ir/index.php GPIUTMD] - GROMACS
